about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Who is Limon Law Office?
about.history_text: Limon Law Office was established in 2023 and has been providing legal services to its clients nationally and internationally since its establishment. By combining the experience and knowledge gained over the years with its dynamic and innovative approach, it continues to offer the best legal solutions to its clients.
about.mission_text: To produce solutions to our clients' legal problems with an honest, transparent and quality service approach while adhering to ethical values.
about.vision_text: To be a law firm referenced for international standards with legal service quality and client satisfaction.

values.integrity_text: We adopt the principle of being honest and transparent to our clients at all times.
values.excellence_text: We work to provide the highest level of quality in every detail.
values.respect_text: We have deep respect for all our stakeholders and the legal system.
values.innovation_text: We are constantly renewing ourselves to keep up with the changing world and legal system.

about.team_section_subtitle: Our team consists of experts in their field

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Legal services we provide
services.corporate_law_desc: Legal consultancy on company establishment, merger and acquisition processes, internal regulations and commercial contracts.
services.family_law_desc: Expert legal support on divorce, custody, alimony, property division and inheritance issues.
services.criminal_law_desc: Effective defense and legal representation in investigation and prosecution processes.
services.real_estate_law_desc: Real estate purchase and sale transactions, zoning law, lease agreements and real estate lawsuits.
services.labor_law_desc: Employee-employer relations, employment contracts, reinstatement, severance and notice pay lawsuits.
services.intellectual_property_desc: Patents, trademark registration, copyrights and intellectual property lawsuits.
services.tax_law_desc: Consultancy on tax planning, tax disputes and tax lawsuits.
services.debt_collection_desc: Collection of receivables, execution proceedings and bankruptcy proceedings.
